title: Custom skins (Skins installer ultimate)
body:
So i have been installing some custom skins, huds, client skins, etc lately but because i messed up a bit i decided to delete my league of legends and redownload the whole game and i also deleted my folder containing Skins Installer Ultimate. After my league of legends finished downloading i tried to download the SIU program again but now i cant open it because it is missing a file called lolviewer.exe .
Whenever i go into the zip to extract the lolviewer.exe it does nothing and now i cannot use the program because of a constant error that im getting being told i do not have the lolviewer.exe file. Does anyone have a solution to this problem? Thanks in advance

replies.body:
He's not stealing anything. He didn't even say he was using skins which you have to pay for. He said
>custom skins

not "paid skins".
